price: Kandi (Allah) ni We wabahaye ukumva, ukubona ndetse (abaha) n’imitima (kugira ngo musobanukirwe), ariko ni gake mushimira.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī ansha-a lakumu al-samʿa wal-abṣāra wal-afidata qalīlan mā tashkurūna
